page.title: 18ASHPERTON(part of)
page.content: The Sun-Valley turkey farm has been open for 12 years.There are 4 sheds with 19000 turkeys in each shed.2 people work there.The turkeys go to the processing plant to be prepared for the table.The hatchery is in Hereford,the turkeys come to the farm as chicks. Canon Frome Post Office Shop: The shop was rebuilt in 1976, bread comes twice a week. The business affected by supermarket at Withington,cheaper than the shop can buy from the wholesaler. Garage 1971.Post Office Sept 1971.Post mistress is paid on the amount of business,reviewed every 3 years. Pension and allowances to people in the area from Ashperton School to Woodsend.Post office and motorists bring trade to the shop. Fields around this area are mostly cereal crops.
